item.title: My Favorite Animes
item.description: I ranked my favorite animes from worst to best. Cowboy Bebop It has a perfect setting and atmosphere. I very much like the world they created in Cowboy Bebop. It’s weakness is it’s low continuity in my opinion. When you finish an episode, Cowboy Bebop never gives you a reason to watch the next episode. There are no cliffhangers. Yet, I strongly recommend Cowboy Bebop because it has good characters, cool storylines and an amazing setting.
